# Tables

## demogTabCat
        

```{r results='asis',echo=FALSE}
fn.src('demogTabCat','TFL',hlp.dir)
```
        

```{r demogTabCat, echo=FALSE}
ex.out=example(demogTabCat,echo = F)$value
if(!is.list(ex.out)) ex.out=list(ex.out)
for(i in 1:length(ex.out)){
junk=texPreview(obj = ex.out[[i]],stem = paste0('demogTabCatEx',i),fileDir = fd,imgFormat = 'png')
}

        

### Name: demogTabCat
### Title: Demographics table for categorical variables
### Aliases: demogTabCat

### ** Examples

data("twoCmt")
ex1=demogTabCat(twoCmt)
ex2=demogTabCat(twoCmt,stratBy = '')
list(ex1,ex2)



        


```
```{r}
slickR(list.files(fd,pattern = glob2rx('demogTabCat*.png'),full.names = T),slideId = 'demogTabCat')
```
